parameters.name: AuthConf
parameters.description: The origin authentication information of the CNAME record.

parameters.name: BizName
parameters.description:
The business scenario of the record for acceleration. Leave the parameter empty if your record is not proxied. Valid values:

*   **image_video**: video and image.
*   **api**: API.
*   **web**: web page.

parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The comment of the record. The maximum length is 100 characters.

parameters.name: Data
parameters.description: The DNS record information. The format of this field varies based on the record type. For more information, see [References](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/2708761.html) .

parameters.name: HostPolicy
parameters.description:
The origin host policy. This policy takes effect when the record type is CNAME. You can set the policy in two modes:

*   follow_hostname: Follow the host record.
*   follow_origin_domain: match the origin's domain name.

parameters.name: Proxied
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to proxy the record. Only CNAME and A/AAAA records can be proxied. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description:
The origin type for the CNAME record. This parameter is required when you add a CNAME record. Valid values:

*   **OSS**: OSS bucket.
*   **S3**: S3 bucket.
*   **LB**: load balancer.
*   **OP**: origin pool.
*   **Domain**: domain name.

If you do not pass this parameter or if you leave its value empty, Domain is used by default.

parameters.name: Ttl
parameters.description: The TTL of the record. Unit: seconds. If the value is 1, the TTL of the record is determined by the system.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the DNS record. For example, A/AAAA, TXT, MX, or CNAME.
